subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Tesla clip
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
--_f60ccdac-285b-44f1-a254-13d6d5bbfa02_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


 Me too, you would think people would move on, maybe reincarnate, but mayb=
e it depends on the egos. I was running #24 this afternoon to test the pane=
l mic, and had both Tesla, and Edison seeming to talk. I  catch very little=
 in that mode, so I didn't get much beyond their names. I started listening=
 closer, and asked a few questions and they all quit talking, all I was get=
ting was just the normal gibbereish chatter as the radio was scanned across=
 the band. I think maybe that's a nail in the coffin of it's all suggestion=
, at least as far as I'm concerned. There's times when no spirits are talki=
ng, and I can only hear the bits of broadcast junk, nothing intelligible. 
=
 
 
 So far #24 remains the best ever box, and I can't tell why. It's just =
thrown togther, I used too small a board for the radio and mic amps, so had=
 to use  a seperate board for the sweep. Then decided to add a tone generat=
or, on yet another board. The idea was that the tone makes like a foundatio=
n of the voices, but as usual I haven't had time to play with that much.
 
=
 Frank-S


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: lisby@...: Thu, 1=
 Nov 2007 15:06:16 -0400Subject: [EVP-ITC] Tesla clip




Oh dear. I keep h=
ope that this supposed rivalry between dead Edison and dead Tesla is just a=
 cosmic joke being pulled on Chris Moon... 

Ann



On Nov 1, 2007, at 8:07=
 AM, EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com wrote:




Hello,This email message is a notif=
ication to let you know thata file has been uploaded to the Files area of t=
he EVP-ITC group.File : /Frank's bo #12 files/3_I'll go face Tesla.wav Uplo=
aded by : bhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@...> Description : I'll=
 go face Tesla You can access this file at the URL:http://groups.yahoo.com/=
group/EVP-ITC/files/Frank%27s%20bo%20%2312%20files/3_I%27ll%20go%20face%20T=
esla.wav To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:http=
://help.yahoo.com/help/us/groups/filesRegards,bhali333 <paranormalinvestiga=
ting@...>

 Me too, you would think people would move on, maybe reinc=
arnate, but maybe it depends on the egos. I was running #24 this afternoon =
to test the panel mic, and had both Tesla, and Edison seeming to talk. I&nb=
sp; catch very little in that mode, so I didn't get much beyond t=
heir names. I started listening closer, and asked a few questions and they =
all quit talking, all I was getting was just the normal gibbereish cha=
tter as the radio was scanned across the band. I think maybe that's a nail =
in the coffin of it's all suggestion, at least as far as I'm concerned. The=
re's times when no spirits are talking, and I can only hear the bits of bro=
adcast junk, nothing intelligible. <BR>
 <BR>
 <BR>
 So far =
#24 remains the best ever box, and I can't tell why. It's just thrown togth=
er, I used too small a board for the radio and mic amps, so had to use&nbsp=
; a seperate board for the sweep. Then decided to add a tone generator, on =
yet another board. The idea was that the tone makes like a foundation of th=
e voices, but as usual I haven't had time to play with that much.<BR>
&nbsp=
;<BR>
 Frank-S<BR><BR><BR>
